name: BallDropz
description:
Sorry it's all broke at the last minute, press Y for credits (ball counter gets stuck)

Idea is to try and get rows across the column with the balls to enter the win spin area. on the spins you can win tickets (inc bonus amount) and extra balls.

Press Space Bar to release balls!

In game stats are broken, but you can export json of the data. No time for any polish or sizzle

Press Alt + F4 to exit

Sorry :(
